channel.title: [508] ::potup command [508]
channel.description: Ok, im using codeusa. and i wanna add ::potup. which is like using pots. but without them it will automaticly go on stats.

item.title: [508] ::potup command [508]
item.dc:creator: @0wn3r_k4t3 0wn3r k4t3
item.description:
@0wn3r_k4t3 wrote:

Ok i got this code

if (cmd[0].equals("potup")) { if (p.skillLvl[cmd[1]] != 3 && p.skillLvl[cmd[1]] != 5) { int potionAddAmount = 0; int skillLevel = p.getLevelForXP(skillLvl[cmd[1]]); potionAddAmount = (skillLevel / 10) * 2; if (potionAddAmount <= 1) { potionAddAmount = 2; } p.skillLvl[cmd[1]] = skillLevel + potionAddAmount; getActionSender().setSkillLvl(p, skillID); } }
and give these errors

Compiling net/com/codeusa/Engine.java .\net\com\codeusa\net\packethandler\Commands.java:969: incompatible types found : java.lang.String required: int if (p.skillLvl[cmd[1]] != 3 && p.skillLvl[cmd[1]] != 5) { ^ .\net\com\codeusa\net\packethandler\Commands.java:969: incompatible types found : java.lang.String required: int if (p.skillLvl[cmd[1]] != 3 && p.skillLvl[cmd[1]] != 5) { ^ .\net\com\codeusa\net\packethandler\Commands.java:971: cannot find symbol symbol : variable skillLvl location: class net.com.codeusa.net.packethandler.Commands int skillLevel = p.getLevelForXP(skillLvl[cmd[1]]); ^ .\net\com\codeusa\net\packethandler\Commands.java:971: incompatible types found : java.lang.String required: int int skillLevel = p.getLevelForXP(skillLvl[cmd[1]]); ^ .\net\com\codeusa\net\packethandler\Commands.java:976: incompatible types found : java.lang.String required: int p.skillLvl[cmd[1]] = skillLevel + potionAddAmount; ^ .\net\com\codeusa\net\packethandler\Commands.java:977: cannot find symbol symbol : variable skillID location: class net.com.codeusa.net.packethandler.Commands getActionSender().setSkillLvl(p, skillID); ^ .\net\com\codeusa\net\packethandler\Commands.java:977: cannot find symbol symbol : method getActionSender() location: class net.com.codeusa.net.packethandler.Commands getActionSender().setSkillLvl(p, skillID); ^ Note: .\net\com\codeusa\clanchat\Room.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 7 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
